content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the vilnius city district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property including a vw caravan land and a house the principle of equal shares was applied and both parties were awarded a ½ share of the property the court also addressed child custody child maintenance payments and the existing surnames of the parties however the vilnius regional court later annulled part of the decision regarding the division of property and sent the case back to the lower court the court considered evidence and arguments from both parties and made decisions regarding the division of property and the payment of costs the applicant was ordered to pay compensation to the defendant and legal costs while the defendant was also ordered to pay legal costs a third party involved in the case was ordered to pay representation costs
